DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this multi-center prospective study is to evaluate the diagnostic performance of S-Shearwave, a newly developed ultrasound shear wave elastography, for the assessment of hepatic fibrosis.
DOC.brief_title: S-Shearwave Elastography for Assessment of Hepatic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Patients with chronic liver disease or cirrhosis, or livingdonor candidates for liver transplantation, or volunteers Signed informed consent Acute hepatitis or bile duct obstruction Serum ALT> 5 times the upper limit of normal within 3 months s/p Rt. hemihepatectomy s/p liver transplantation Large mass or infiltrative lesion in the right lobe of the liver
